com.localytics.android

Class MessagingListenerV2Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localytics.android.MessagingListenerV2Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingListenerV2

    public class MessagingListenerV2Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessagingListenerV2
    This adapter class provides empty implementations of the methods from MessagingListenerV2. Any custom listener that cares only about a subset of the methods of this listener can simply subclass this adapter class instead of implementing the interface directly.

        Parameters:
        campaign - The campaign that will be shown

      • localyticsShouldDelaySessionStartInAppMessages

        public boolean localyticsShouldDelaySessionStartInAppMessages()
        Description copied from interface: MessagingListenerV2
        Callback to determine if In-App campaigns triggered by session start should be shown. This callback is useful for integrations that want to delay presentation of startup campaigns due to the fact that they have some startup state, such as a splash screen.
        Specified by:
        localyticsShouldDelaySessionStartInAppMessages in interface MessagingListenerV2
        Returns:
        The decision to delay in-app campaigns triggered by the "Session Start" event.
        See Also:
        Localytics.triggerInAppMessagesForSessionStart()
